page.title: 05BIOGRAPHY W.BERGHOLT WRITER
page.content: {JOHN GRANT { WEST BERGHOLT AUTHOR {JOHN GRANT}IS A FRIGHTENED MAN.THE BOOKS HE WROTE FOR FUN ARE NOW BEING TURNED INTO A TV SERIES BY THE BBC. AND SUDDENLY IT'S SERIOUS BUSINESS.JOHN WHO HAS A CAREER AS A DOCTOR OF TROPICAL MEDICINES AT THE UNIVERSITY OF LONDON'S FACULTY OF MEDICINE COULD HAVE GIVEN THIS UP BECAUSE OF HIS NEWFOUND POPULARITY AS A WRITER BUT DIDN'T.IT STILL COMES AS A SURPRISE THAT DESPITE HIS RECENT SUCCESS HE STILL INSISTS THAT WRITING IS JUST A PASTIME. THE STORY CHARACTER WHICH IS BEING USED IS THAT OF LOVEJOY,WHO SEEMS TO KNOW MORE ABOUT ANTIQUES THAN MOST PEOPLE PUT TOGETHER. (contd.on page 6)
